pipe.c

00001 #include <sys/types.h>
00002 #include <fcntl.h>
00003 #include <string.h>
00004 #include <stdio.h>
00005 #include <native/pipe.h>
00006 
00007 #define PIPE_MINOR 0
00008 
00009 /* User-space side */
00010 
00011 int pipe_fd;
00012 
00013 int main (int argc, char *argv[])
00014 
00015 {
00016     char devname[32], buf[16];
00017 
00018     /* ... */
00019 
00020     sprintf(devname,"/dev/rtp%d",PIPE_MINOR);
00021     pipe_fd = open(devname,O_RDWR);
00022     
00023     if (pipe_fd < 0)
00024         fail();
00025 
00026     /* Wait for the prompt string "Hello"... */
00027     read(pipe_fd,buf,sizeof(buf));
00028 
00029     /* Then send the reply string "World": */
00030     write(pipe_fd,"World",sizeof("World"));
00031 
00032     /* ... */
00033 }
00034 
00035 void cleanup (void)
00036 
00037 {
00038     close(pipe_fd);
00039 }
00040 
00041 /* Kernel-side */
00042 
00043 #define TASK_PRIO  0               /* Highest RT priority */
00044 #define TASK_MODE  T_FPU|T_CPU(0)  /* Uses FPU, bound to CPU #0 */
00045 #define TASK_STKSZ 4096            /* Stack size (in bytes) */
00046 
00047 RT_TASK task_desc;
00048 
00049 RT_PIPE pipe_desc;
00050 
00051 void task_body (void)
00052 
00053 {
00054     RT_PIPE_MSG *msgout, *msgin;
00055     int err, len;
00056 
00057     /* ... */
00058 
00059     len = sizeof("Hello");
00060     /* Get a message block of the right size in order to initiate the
00061        message-oriented dialog with the user-space process. Sending a
00062        continuous stream of bytes is also possible using
00063        rt_pipe_stream(), in which case no message buffer needs to be
00064        preallocated. */
00065     msgout = rt_pipe_alloc(len);
00066 
00067     if (!msgout)
00068         fail();
00069 
00070     /* Send prompt message "Hello" (the output buffer will be freed
00071        automatically)... */
00072     strcpy(RT_PIPE_MSGPTR(msgout),"Hello");
00073     rt_pipe_send(&pipe_desc,msgout,len,P_NORMAL);
00074 
00075     /* Then wait for the reply string "World": */
00076     rt_pipe_receive(&pipe_desc,&msgin,TM_INFINITE);
00077     printf("received msg> %s, size=%d\n",P_MSGPTR(msg),P_MSGSIZE(msg));
00078     /* Free the received message buffer. */
00079     rt_pipe_free(&pipe_desc,msgin);
00080 
00081     /* ... */
00082 }
00083 
00084 init init_module (void)
00085 
00086 {
00087     int err;
00088 
00089     err = rt_pipe_create(&pipe_desc,NULL,PIPE_MINOR);
00090 
00091     if (err)
00092         fail();
00093 
00094     /* ... */
00095 
00096     err = rt_task_create(&task_desc,
00097                          "MyTaskName",
00098                          TASK_STKSZ,
00099                          TASK_PRIO,
00100                          TASK_MODE);
00101     if (!err)
00102         rt_task_start(&task_desc,&task_body,NULL);
00103 
00104     /* ... */
00105 }
00106 
00107 void cleanup_module (void)
00108 
00109 {
00110     rt_pipe_delete(&pipe_desc);
00111     rt_task_delete(&task_desc);
00112 }
